title: Pixel 3XL September 5th update NO DATA
content: I did the Sept 5th 2019 update on my Pixel 3xl and now I have no data on the phone anymore and the phone is now showing 4g not LTE any more.  It is on ATT, APN is correct. I downgraded the connectivity services and the phone is still not working properly.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
